Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION
REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Enacts the "digital fairness act"
LawCode: Add Art 39-FF §§899-cc - 899-ii, §350-a-1, Gen Bus L; amd §292, add §296-e, Exec L; amd §§165 & 8, St Fin L; amd §814, Ed L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, the executive law, the state finance law and the education law, in relation to enacting the "digital fairness act"
